title: Noam Chomsky Criticizes “Autocratic” Nicaraguan Government, Urges Ortega to Call for New Elections
description:
https://democracynow.org - International human rights groups say that over 300 people have died in Nicaragua since the protests erupted in April and that the vast majority have been killed by pro-government forces. Earlier this week, Nicaraguan President Daniel Ortega rejected calls to step down from power, amid mounting protests and civil unrest. We speak to Noam Chomsky about the current crisis and the role of the U.S. in Nicaragua in the 1980s.
